objectives: Students will discuss health and fitness using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to health and fitness
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining health and fitness content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore health and fitness through a Science Fiction lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving health and fitness

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to health and fitness in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about health and fitness using neutral register
Students create original scifi themed content about health and fitness in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe health and fitness in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in health and fitness?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about health and fitness?
How does health and fitness change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving health and fitness
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
